#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
french_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Terre Verte
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:french_language
					culture.language = language:french_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:french_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:french_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:new_jersey_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
french_pennsylvania_area_scripted_country_name = { #Andastiane, Andastes 
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:french_language
					culture.language = language:french_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:french_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:french_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:pennsylvania_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

						culture.language = language:french_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:high_plains_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
french_badlands_area_scripted_country_name = { #Pays des Cheyennes
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:french_language
					culture.language = language:french_language

					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:columbia_interior_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
french_california_area_scripted_country_name = { #Haute-Californie
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:french_language
					culture.language = language:french_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:french_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:french_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:california_area
    		}
    	}

    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
